title: About the Client List Section
description: In this section, you’ll find detailed information about player lists, email lists, balances, bonuses, and restrictions.

title: About Reports
description: This section provides insights into betting reports, transaction records, and periodic results for comprehensive analysis.

title: About Agents Management
description: Here, you can access information about agent lists, transaction details, and payment agents for efficient management.

title: About PAM Users Management
description: This section offers information on user lists, access history, and roles to help manage platform permissions.

title: About Site Configuration
description: Find guidance on managing banners, editing static pages, and handling translations to customize your platform.

title: About Partner Configuration
description: In this section, you’ll find information about service integrations and payment methods to streamline your operations.
